== Xubuntu Development Team ==

The <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~xubuntu-dev|Xubuntu Development Team]]</nowiki> is the official group of individuals responsible for bringing you the actual Xubuntu product. It is a multi-faceted role involving tasks such as packaging, fixing bugs, working with upstream projects, managing seeds, implementing features, and much more.
